620.学園内でのみ\n使うことのできる\nお招きのつばさ改:
Invitation Wing
only usable in
the school.

Unlocks sealed
facilities of
the school.

student Emmett.

Mysterious key
to rescue

SCC member
emblem that
Crown discarded.

878.使うと学園内の\nどこかを写した\n写真を確認できる:
Use it to see a

part of campus.

913.アンティークな\n雰囲気ただよう\n金属製のボタン:
Metal button
with an antique

946.遺跡の封印された\n彫像を解放できる\n不思議なカギ:
Releases the
sealed statues
in the ruins.

981.アイゼルの手で\n修理された\nフウキ委員の証:
SCC member
emblem repaired

1011.フウキの証を\n修理するために\n必要な素材:
Material needed
to repair an
SCC Emblem.

1040.フウキの証を\n修理するために\n必要な工具:
Tools needed
to repair an
SCC Emblem.

1069.エメットという\n生徒が書いた\n２通めの手紙:
Second letter
written by
student Emmett.

1099.学園の美術室に\n飾ってある\n石像の写真:
Photo of a
stone statue in
the art room.

1126.メイサが友達の\nマージョリーに\n貸したノート:
Note that Meisa
gave to her
friend Marjorie.

1244.口の中でとろける\n上等な脂がのった\n霜降りカルビ肉:
Marbled ribs
that melt in
the mouth.

1280.願いを刻印できる\n流星をあしらった\nブレスレット:
Bracelet where
wishes can be
engraved.

1315.対策室で撮影した\nシュメリア先生の\nスナップショット:

1353.救護室で撮影した\nチェルシー先生の\nスナップショット:

1420.クラウンが\n手作りした\nからあげ弁当:

1446.イオ１０系の顔が\n撮られた\nチラシ用の写真:
Photo of a Bang
10 series face
for a flyer.

1476.リソルの名前と\n写真がのっている\n生徒手帳:
Student ID
with Resol's
name and photo.

1506.持つ者に不幸を\nもたらすらしい\nおそろしい絵:
Brings
misfortune to
one who has it.

1538.ラピスが描いた\nフウキの仲間の\n味のある絵:
Drawing of
SCC members
by Lapis.

1568.白く滑らかな\nシルクで作られた\n高級な布地:
Luxury fabric
made of white
smooth silk.

1598.白く滑らかな\nシルクで作られた\n美しい手袋:
Lovely gloves
made of white
smooth silk.

1628.メロチカが\n丁寧に仕上げた\n美しき織物:
Lovely fabric
carefully made

1655.白衣のしあげに\n使用する\n脱色用の漂白剤:
Bleach used
for bleaching

1684.チェルシーのため\nたんせい込めて\n作られた白衣:
White coat
made with care
for Chelsea.

1717.ミランが育てた\n赤くて美しい\n一輪の花:
One beautiful
red flower
grown by Milan.

1744.ソノ特製の\nバブルスライムを\n模したジャムパン:
Jam buns in

1777.身体によさそうな\nみどり色の\nジャム:
Green jam that
looks good for

Opens the
mysterious door

1833.湖の遺跡にある\n精霊の間への扉を\n開くためのカギ:

1868.フェルディナクが\n執筆したという\n予言書の上巻:

Given by Eisel

2139.リソルから\n友情の証として\n贈られた指輪:
Given by Resol

Given by Crown
as a good-luck

2200.フランジュから\nお守りとして\n贈られたロザリオ:
Given by Frange

Given by Lapis

2263.<pc>は 解放のカギを手に取り\nじっくり ながめてみた。\n<br>\n金属:
takes the Liberation Key in their hand and looks at it closely.
It looks like it is made of metal, but it doesn't have any weight to it at all...

2355.<pc>は エメットの手紙を読んだ。\n<br>\n<pc>さんへ。\n屋上で待:
reads Emmett's Letter.
To . I'll be waiting on the rooftop. Come quickly. From Emmett

2448.<pc>は フウキの証を\nじっくり ながめてみた。\n<br>\n細かな装飾が:
takes a closer look at the SCC Emblem.
It is made of finely decorated metal. feels a little sense of pride!

2549.<pc>は 王子の模造刀を\nかかげてみた。\n<br>\n子供の安全を 考えた:
holds up the Prince's Fake Sword.
The blade of the sword does not have an edge...perhaps for the safety of the children. It doesn't seem to be useful in a real battle.

2654.<pc>は 記憶のカギを手に取り\nじっくり ながめてみた。\n<br>\n金属:
takes the Memory Key in their hand and looks at it closely.
It's a strange key that looks like it is made of metal, but it doesn't have any weight to it at all.

2752.<pc>は 解呪のおふだを\nじっくり ながめてみた。\n<br>\n講堂の結界:
takes a closer look at the Dispel Talisman.
It's a special amulet made by Principal Baunze imbued with a magical power to destroy the auditorium's wards.

2840.<pc>は\n仲間のフウキの証を にぎりしめた。\n<br>\nアイゼルから た:
grasps the Member's SCC Emblem.
They wish for the day to come when they can return the SCC emblem that Eisel gave them to Crown.

2934.<pc>は ゲッチュ君の写真を\nじっくり ながめてみた。\n<br>\nこの写:
takes a closer look at the Your Getchu Photo.
If they go to the location in the photo, they are sure to find the item they are looking for.

3026.<pc>は 古びた制服のボタンを\n手に取って じっくり ながめてみた。\n<b:
takes the Old Uniform Button in their hand and looks at it closely.
There are small scratches on the dull surface. It looks like a button from a boys' uniform at Asfeld Academy.

3153.<pc>は 宿願のカギを手に取り\nじっくり ながめてみた。\n<br>\n金属:
takes the Key of Desire in their hand and looks at it closely.
It looks like it is made of metal, but it doesn't have any weight to it at all.

3242.<pc>は リソルのフウキの証を\nじっくり ながめてみた。\n<br>\n細か:
takes a closer look at Resol's SCC Emblem.
It is made of finely decorated metal. It looks shinier than it did before Resol destroyed it.

3359.<pc>は 聖銀のかけらを\n手に取って じっくり ながめてみた。\n<br>\:
takes the Piece of Silver in their hand and looks at it closely.
It's a small chunk of silver. It can be melted down and processed into various things.

3457.<pc>は 特別工具セットを\nじっくり ながめてみた。\n<br>\n金切のこ:
takes a closer look at the Special Tool Set.
There are various tools in the box, such as a metal saw and a file.

3548.<pc>は エメットから届いた\n２通めの手紙を読んだ。\n<br>\n<pc>:
reads the second letter sent from Emmett.
To . If you come to the rooftop, I'll tell you everything about me. From Emmett

3673.<pc>は 美術室の石像の写真を\nじっくり ながめてみた。\n<br>\n今に:
takes a closer look at the Art Room Statue Photo.
The stone statue in the photo conveys a sense of liveliness, as if it's about to start moving at any moment.

3767.<pc>は メイサのノートを\n手に取った。\n<br>\nメイサのノートには:
takes Meisa's Notebook in their hand.
In the notebook, Meisa's name is meticulously written.

3844.<pc>は モンポ計の\nスイッチを 押してみようとした。\n<br>\nしかし:
tries to press the switch of the Monster Points Meter.
But they feel like it might break if they mess with it carelessly, so they decide against it.

3930.<pc>は リュクスレザーを\nそっと なでてみた。\n<br>\nしっとりとし:
gently strokes the Luxe Leather.
The moist and smooth feel of the leather is somewhat addictive to the touch.

4018.<pc>は デリシャスカルビを\nじっくり ながめてみた。\n<br>\nやわら:
takes a closer look at the Delicious Ribs.
There is plenty of soft fat on it, and just looking at it makes them hungry.

4113.<pc>は 学園の写真を\nじっくり ながめてみた。\n<br>\nシュメリア先:
takes a closer look at the school photo.
Miss Sumeria is smiling kindly.

4181.<pc>は 学園の写真を\nじっくり ながめてみた。\n<br>\nチェルシー先:
takes a closer look at the school photo.
Miss Chelsea is smiling seductively.

4254.<pc>は 旨辛ソースの素を\nちょっぴり なめてみた。\n<br>\nピリリと:
tastes the Spicy Sauce Mix just a little.
The spiciness makes their tongue numb.

4322.<pc>は 手作りからあげ弁当を\n手に取ってみた。\n<br>\nお弁当箱から:
takes the Homemade Fried Bento in their hand.
The box is filled with the savory aroma of the spicy sauce and freshly fried chicken.

4427.<pc>は イオ１０系の写真を\nじっくり ながめてみた。\n<br>\nイオ１:
takes a closer look at the Bang 10 Series Photo.
The dignified face of the Bang 10 series conveys the power it has to pull the passenger cars.

4526.<pc>は リソルの生徒手帳を\nじっくり ながめてみた。\n<br>\n頼んで:
takes a closer look at Resol's Student ID.
This student ID is the only place where you can see a photo of Resol with a serious face, which he probably won't show you if you ask.

4637.<pc>は 呪いの絵を\nじっくり ながめてみた。\n<br>\nなんとも まが:
takes a closer look at the Cursed Drawing.
It's a very ominous drawing. The figures of two individuals are depicted.

4722.<pc>は ラピスの友達の絵を\nじっくり ながめてみた。\n<br>\nラピス:
takes a closer look at Lapis' Members Drawing.
It's a picture of SCC Members drawn by Lapis. The result is very tasteful.

4826.<pc>は ホワイトシルクを\n手に取ってみた。\n<br>\nまるで 空気のよ:
takes the White Silk in their hand.
It's as light and smooth as air!

4888.<pc>は 純白の手袋を\n手に取ってみた。\n<br>\nキラキラ光る糸で 細:
takes the Pure White Gloves in their hand.
These gloves are like a work of art, meticulously embroidered with glittering thread.

4968.<pc>は 超エッチなしたぎを\nじっくり ながめてみた。\n<br>\n素材選:
takes a closer look at the Really Robust Lingerie.
Melochika's attention to detail, from material selection to design and processing, is evident in this remarkably robust lingerie.

5082.<pc>は バリバリ漂白剤を\nじっくり ながめてみた。\n<br>\n使用する:
takes a closer look at the Strong Bleach.
It's a bleach that seems to turn things super white when used. They look forward to using it on their white coat.

5197.<pc>は チェルシーの白衣を\nじっくり ながめてみた。\n<br>\nチェル:
takes a closer look at Chelsea's White Coat.
It's a shiny new white coat that will suit Miss Chelsea perfectly. The bright cleanliness of the pure white makes their eyes flicker.

5318.<pc>は ミランの花の\nにおいを かいでみた。\n<br>\n甘くて 濃密な:
takes a sniff of Milan's Flower.
The sweet, dense scent of flowers wafts through the air.

5389.<pc>は\nバブスラジャムパンの匂いを\nかいでみた。\n<br>\n先ほどの:
takes a sniff of the Bubble Slime Jam Bread.
The taste of food from earlier resurfaces in their mouth, making them feel sick.

5465.<pc>は キアリージャムを\nちょっぴり なめてみようとした……。\n<br>:
tries to taste the Squelch Jam just a little...
But they instinctively sense the danger and decide against it!

5547.<pc>は 異界のカギを手に取り\nじっくり ながめてみた。\n<br>\n金属:
takes the Otherworld Key in their hand and looks at it closely.
It looks like it is made of metal, but it doesn't have any weight to it at all...

5639.<pc>は 精霊のカギを手に取り\nじっくり ながめてみた。\n<br>\n金属:
takes the Spirit Key in their hand and looks at it closely.
It looks like it is made of metal, but it doesn't have any weight to it at all...

5731.<pc>は フェルディナクの書・上を\n開いて ぱらぱらと めくってみた。\n<:
opens Ferdinak's Book Vol. 1 and flicks through the pages.
But every page is filled with unfamiliar characters, and they cannot read a single line.

5844.<pc>は ミランのおまねキーを\nじっくり ながめてみた。\n<br>\nこの:
takes a closer look at Milan's Copied Key.
It seems that with this key, they can visit Milan's room at the Place of Prayer!

5936.<pc>は フランジュのおまねキーを\n手に取ってみた。\n<br>\nこのカギ:
takes Frange's Copied Key in their hand.
It seems that with this key, they can visit Frange's room at the Place of Prayer!

6028.<pc>は アイゼルのおまねキーを\n手に取ってみた。\n<br>\nこのカギが:
takes Eisel's Copied Key in their hand.
It seems that with this key, they can visit Eisel's room at the Place of Prayer!

6117.<pc>は クラウンのおまねキーを\n手に取ってみた。\n<br>\nこのカギが:
takes Crown's Copied Key in their hand.
It seems that with this key, they can visit Crown's room at the Place of Prayer!

6206.<pc>は ラピスのおまねキーを\n手に取ってみた。\n<br>\nこのカギがあ:
takes Lapis' Copied Key in their hand.
It seems that with this key, they can visit Lapis' room at the Place of Prayer!

6292.<pc>は リソルのおまねキーを\n手に取ってみた。\n<br>\nこのカギがあ:
takes Resol's Copied Key in their hand.
It seems that with this key, they can visit Resol's room at the Place of Prayer!

6378.<pc>は 手作りの指輪を 手に取った。\n<br>\nアイゼルが <pc>のた:
takes the Handmade Ring in their hand.
It's a cool ring that Eisel made for .
feels a warmth as they remember the friendship they nurtured with Eisel throughout their time at the school.

6505.<pc>は 王族の指輪を 手に取った。\n<br>\nミランが 身につけていた\:
takes the Royalty Ring in their hand.
It's a ring that Milan wore and it seems to have a long history.
feels a warmth as they remember the friendship they nurtured with Milan throughout their time at the school.

6628.<pc>は 盟約の指輪を 手に取った。\n<br>\nリソルから 贈られた\nた:
takes the Pledge Ring in their hand.
It's a ring with a peculiar atmosphere given by Resol.
feels a warmth as they remember the friendship they nurtured with Resol throughout their time at the school.

6751.<pc>は\n琥珀のロザリオを 手に取った。\n<br>\nクラウンが 身につけ:
takes the Amber Rosary in their hand.
It's a beautiful rosary that Crown wore.
feels a warmth as they remember the friendship they nurtured with Crown throughout their time at the school.

6876.<pc>は\nルビーのロザリオを 手に取った。\n<br>\nフランジュが 身に:
takes the Ruby Rosary in their hand.
It's a cute rosary that Frange wore.
feels a warmth as they remember the friendship they nurtured with Frange throughout their time at the school.

7010.<pc>は\nハートのロザリオを 手に取った。\n<br>\nラピスが 身につけ:
takes the Heart Rosary in their hand.
It's a cute rosary that Lapis wore.
feels a warmth as they remember the friendship they nurtured with Lapis throughout their time at the school.
